borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<div>The scale, siting and design of the proposed development would result in the loss of daylight and overshadowing to neighbouring windows, in addition to an increased sense of overbearingness, therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to:</div><div><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="font-size: 10.5pt;"><br></span></div><ul><li><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="font-size: 10.5pt;">Paragraph 130 of the National Planning Policy Framework</span>&nbsp;(NPPF) (DLUHC, September 2023)</li><li>Part D in Policy
D6 of the London Plan (March 2021);</li><li>Policy
CP3 of Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)</li><li>Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough
Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)</li><li>Paragraph 4.2 of the Residential
Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012);</li><li>Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of the London Borough of Barking and
Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan 2037 (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</li></ul>

<div>The scale, bulk, massing and design of the proposed rear extension dominates the original dwellinghouse and is considered harmful to the appearance of the house, built form of the terrace, streetscene and character of the area. As such, the proposed development is contrary to:</div><div><br></div><ul><li><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="font-size: 10.5pt;">Paragraphs 126, 130, and 134 of the National Planning Policy Framework </span>(NPPF) (DLUHC, September 2023)</li><li>Policy D4 of the
London Plan (March 2021)</li><li>Policy
CP3 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010)</li><li>Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough
Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011)</li><li>Paragraph 5.3.3 of the Residential
Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)</li><li>Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of the London Borough of Barking and
Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan 2037 (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</li></ul>
description: Construction of a first floor rear extension
